generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action.
notFound: The requested resource was not found.
INVALID_DATE_RANGE: End date must be after start date.
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: System error. Please try again later.
EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: Email not found in the system.
PLAN_IN_USE: Plan is in use and cannot be deleted.
PLAN_NOT_ACTIVE: Subscription plan is no longer active.
PLAN_EXCEEDS_EMPLOYEE_LIMIT: Current employee count exceeds plan limit.
DEPOSIT_ALREADY_PROCESSED: Deposit request has already been processed.
MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT: Deposit amount is below the minimum.
COMMISSION_NOT_ELIGIBLE: Commission is not eligible for payment.
BREAK_ALREADY_ACTIVE: A break is already in progress.
MAX_BREAKS_REACHED: Maximum number of breaks reached for today.
ALREADY_CHECKED_IN: You have already checked in today.
NOT_CHECKED_IN: You have not checked in yet.
ALREADY_CHECKED_OUT: You have already checked out today.
BREAK_RECORD_ID_REQUIRED: Please select a break record to adjust.
ADJUSTMENT_PENDING_EXISTS: A pending adjustment request already exists.
ADJUSTMENT_ALREADY_PROCESSED: Adjustment request has already been processed.
ADJUSTMENT_NO_CHANGES: At least one time must be changed.
TENANT_DOMAIN_EXISTS: Company domain is already in use.
TENANT_PROVISIONING_FAILED: Failed to create company database. Please try again.
TENANT_NOT_FOUND: Company does not exist or has been deleted.
USER_CREATION_FAILED: Failed to create user account. Please try again.
DEPARTMENT_CIRCULAR_REFERENCE: Cannot create circular reference in department structure.
SHIFT_OVERLAP_EXISTS: Shift time overlaps with another shift on the same day.
